summary.content: I have a new girlfriend, and she seems to have an affinity for pet names. Me, I’m not so good at them, but at least I try hard. She says it’s an adorable part of my geeky charm. I can live with that. Cereal Her: Hey honey bun! How are you? Me: Look at you… honey bunches of oats! Breakfast pastries Her: Could you do me a favor, love muffin? Me: Sure thing, my little… um… sex bagel.

content.html:
I have a new girlfriend, and she seems to have an affinity for pet names. Me, I’m not so good at them, but at least I try hard.

She says it’s an adorable part of my geeky charm. I can live with that.

Cereal

Her: Hey honey bun! How are you?

Me: Look at you… honey bunches of oats!

Breakfast pastries

Her: Could you do me a favor, love muffin?

Me: Sure thing, my little… um… sex bagel.

Hentai

Her: Good morning, love bug.

Me: Good morning my… um… lusty tentacle…
content.plain:
I have a new girlfriend, and she seems to have an affinity for pet names. Me, I’m not so good at them, but at least I try hard.   She says it’s an adorable part of my geeky charm. I can live with that.
Cereal  Her: Hey honey bun! How are you?
Me: Look at you… honey bunches of oats!
 Breakfast pastries  Her: Could you do me a favor, love muffin?
Me: Sure thing, my little… um… sex bagel.
 Hentai  Her: Good morning, love bug.
Me: Good morning my… um… lusty tentacle…
content.source:
{{< description >}}
I have a new girlfriend, and she seems to have an affinity for pet names. Me, I’m not so good at them, but at least I try hard.
{{< /description >}}

{{<fullimage src="https://cdn.ryanparman.com/hugo/posts/2017/instagram-jessika.jpg" alt="Jessika" width="658" height="658" >}}

She says it’s an adorable part of my geeky charm. I can live with that.

## Cereal

> Her: Hey honey bun! How are you?
>
> Me: Look at you… honey bunches of oats!

## Breakfast pastries

> Her: Could you do me a favor, love muffin?
>
> Me: Sure thing, my little… um… sex bagel.

## Hentai

> Her: Good morning, love bug.
>
> Me: Good morning my… um… lusty tentacle…
